JD -

pace

correct technical decisions are being made to deliver brilliant experiences from our

products

conferences/meetups

skills & experience

Prettier), HTML and CSS Preprocessors

loading / caching, PWA).

(WCAG 2.0 AA compliance and WAI-ARIA), Security, Performance optimisation and

responsive design

• Unit test tools (Jest)

• Versioning tools (GIT)

Lifecycle methods using hooks, Reusing state logics custom Hooks

Advanced React

Virtual DOM, Reconciliation, Context API, Render props wrapper hell

Redux

Redux Architecture/ Fundamental principles, latest Redux hooks, Middleware's(Thunk or saga)

JS/ES6

latest features(variable scope, arrow fn, Template Strings, Object/Array destructure, Optional chaining, Spread/Rest/Null coalescing operator), Typescript, New Array methods, Async/Await, yield/generator functions, Promises

CSS/Responsive design

Flexbox, Display/Position, Box model, CSS selectors

Tools:

Webpack/Gulp/Grunt, Unit Testing, GIT, etc

Experience in Source Control (Bitbucket/GIT)

Knowledge and experience with using Restful API

Must be able to translate specifications (wireframes) into high-quality code

Must be able to design components to drive reusability and performance

Must be able to build responsive design

Design, develop, and maintain code that meets requirements, is high quality, and performs efficiently and effectively to provide a great customer experience.

Write production quality and thoroughly tested code

React Native Developer,

Unifize

Sourcing Country: India Pakistan Sri Lanka Bangladesh Indonesia

Timezones: New Delhi [UTC +5]

Job Description:

Unifize is a low-code, software-as-a-service (SaaS) company. We are building the future of industrial collaboration for manufacturing companies. We have a rapidly expanding customer portfolio based in the US, UK, and India. We have a committed user base who love our product. We are constantly adding new features and optimisations to meet the demands of our existing users and trying to attract customers in niches that we are yet to explore.

Over the last five years, we are constantly stretching the boundaries of what is achievable using existing tools and libraries in the React Nativen ecosystem to meet the demands of our application. With its ever-expanding feature set and stringent performance demands, Unifize continues to throw new challenges at its developers and provides ample growth opportunities.

We are looking for a bright programmer with exceptional attention to detail. Here is a fantastic opportunity for someone prepared to learn on the job in a challenging environment and produce high-quality software. We need someone who is technically strong, has a good foundation in computer science, is energetic, highly collaborative and passionate about the product and our customers.

Responsibilities:

Plan feature implementations by working closely with the product team.

Deliver intuitive user experience.

Collaborate with backend-end developers in designing APIs.

Write elegant, maintainable, and performant code.

Automate deployments and monitor crashes.

Qualifications:

Hands-on experience with React Native and Redux

Deep understanding of JavaScript/Typescript.

Knowledge of functional programming.

Agile, proactive, and hard working.

B.Tech/B.E. or higher degree in Computer Science.

Category

Mobile Developers (Web, Mobile & Software Dev)

We are looking for a skilled react.js developer to join our front-end development team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing user interface components using React.js concepts and workflows such as Redux, Flux, and Webpack. You will also be responsible for profiling and improving front-end performance and documenting our front-end codebase.

To ensure success as a react.js developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of JavaScript and React concepts, excellent front-end coding skills, and a good understanding of progressive web applications. Ultimately, a top-class react.js developer should be able to design and build modern user interface components to enhance application performance.
React.js Developer Responsibilities:
• Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.
• Reviewing application requirements and interface designs.
• Identifying web-based user interactions.
• Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components using react concepts.
• Writing application interface codes using JavaScript following react.js workflows.
• Troubleshooting interface software and debugging application codes.
• Developing and implementing front-end architecture to support user interface concepts.
• Monitoring and improving front-end performance.
• Documenting application changes and developing updates.
React.js Developer Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information technology, or a similar field.
• Previous experience working as a react.js developer.
• In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and front-end languages.
• Knowledge of REACT tools including React.js, Webpack, Enzyme, Redux, and Flux.
• Experience with user interface design.
• Knowledge of performance testing frameworks including Mocha and Jest.
• Experience with browser-based debugging and performance testing software.
• Excellent troubleshooting skills.
• Good project management skills.

Responsibilities :
• Developing new user-facing features using React.js and other JavaScript libraries
• Building reusable cross-platform components and front-end libraries for future use
• Expertise with Web Services / REST APIs. Translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code
• Optimising components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers
• Maintain and enhance existing websites while adhering to best practices
• Play a significant role in the requirements gathering, working with Design and Product Managers by providing technical suggestions
• Take part in Sprint planning calls and provide technical input (approach, estimate)
• Perform code review before deployment and provide technical review/feedback to engineers
• Understand and uphold current design and architecture patterns
• Work with the team to deliver business needs in the fastest possible time frame without incurring significant-tech debt

Requirements :
• Minimum 1 year of work experience required
• Required experience with React.js with Redux
• Strong user experience focus, and experience delivering consumer tech products
• Experience with both Responsive and Adaptive Web Design
• Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
• Comfortable researching and adopting new web technologies
• Experience with MongoDB would be a plus
• Experience as a developer in an Agile/SCRUM environment
• Commitment to excellence in designing, coding, testing, debugging, configuring, and documenting software
• Strong communication skills and a collaborative spirit will be key to success in this role

Required Skills & Experience :
• JavaScript (React.js, es6) - at least 1 year of experience
• HTML, CSS, SCSS - at least 1 year of experience
• Photoshop, illustrator - basic knowledge
• Typescript knowledge is a plus
• Excellent knowledge of GIT

Key Skills : HTML, CSS, SCSS, React, Redux, Redux Saga

Position: Full time
• Salary *: 8k to 30k

The Fast Way focuses on Web Design, Web Development, Web Hosting, and Digital Marketing. Their company has offices in India. They have a small team that's between 11-50 employees.

Description

This is a remote position.

A front-end developer is a tech-savvy role that requires expertise in web design and involves translating customer needs into interactive web apps with visual elements that users see and interact with. A front-end developer is responsible for ensuring that the application is optimized both in technology and aesthetics while delivering the best user experience on desktop and mobile.

We are looking for a seasoned front-end developer with experience in ReactJS, Redux (or any other State Management framework), TailwindCSS to join our product team who will be an exceptional problem solver.

Skills required:
• 1+ years’ experience in software development.
• Hands-on experience in Frontend Development.
• Experience with React.
• Experience with TypeScript and JavaScript.
• Good knowledge of UI frameworks such as AngularJS.
• Experience with HTML, CSS, SASS, and tailwindcss.
• Familiarity with RESTful APIs.
• Working knowhow of Git.
• An active interest in staying up to date with new technology, new frameworks, new languages, and other developments.
• Basic Knowledge of Agile methodologies.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and learning capability.

Personal traits we are looking for:
• Are you naturally curious and willing to pick up new skills?
• Do you get excited about solving interesting problems?
• Can you verbalize several proposed solutions for a given problem?
• Are you opinionated but enjoying the benefits of being a generalist and not tied down to a specific language, framework, or particular process?
• Most importantly, do you have clarity about things?

Roles and Responsibilities:

Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.

Reviewing application requirements and interface designs.

Identifying web-based user interactions.

Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components using React concepts.

Writing application interface codes using JavaScript following React.js workflows.

Troubleshooting interface software and debugging application codes.

Developing and implementing front-end architecture to support user interface concepts.

Monitoring and improving front-end performance.

Documenting application changes and developing updates.
• *Build your career with us.

Remote Friendly

Oats Tech is a 100% remote friendly distributed team. We want you to work properly without compromising family time.

Up to Date

We always encourage to explore and implement new technologies. Efficient coding, automation, new tech stacks, improved tactics is our core. Learn while working and be up to date.

5 Days a week

Quality of the work and delivery timeline only matters. Be sincere on weekdays and chill out on weekends.

Flexibility

You can choose flexible time as per your convenience, with 4-5 hours of overlapped time period with the teammates. We want you to be comfortable and at your peak to execute the best.

OATSTECH focuses on Software. Their company has offices in India. They have a small team that's between 1-10 employees.

You can view their website at https://oatstech.co

job_description:
Our direct client, a fast-growing digital healthcare company based in NY, is looking for a front-end developer with React experience. Client’s mission is to help advance the discovery of new medications and treatments, working with patients, pharmaceutical and biotech companies. This position can be 100% remote. You will write lots of typescript, build UIs, submit pull requests, participate in code reviews, and help to build top notch healthcare products. You are also expected to be proficient with CSS.
Responsibilities:
• Design and develop React frontend components
• Integrate REST api backend endpoints
• Develop frontend dashboards and forms
• Write css/sass for styling visual elements
• Help us fix bugs and advise on best practices
• Write secure testable code including unit tests
• Integrate code with CI/CD pipelines
• Work with team leads on requirements and communicate level-of-effort and timelines
• Submit and review pull requests

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in CS or equivalent experience
• 6+ years of JavaScript frontend development experience (including css)
• 6+ years of CSS experience
• 4+ years of React experience
• 4+ years of Typescript experience
• Experience with Git, pull requests, and code reviews (you should understand Git rebase)
• Experience with agile software development and Kanban
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills

Tools and IDEs:
• Use the OS, IDE, and code editor of your choice. We have team members using WebStorm, vscode, and vim, working on macOS, Linux, and windows. You are expected to be proficient with git, we use GitHub for managing code.

Nice to have skills
• Experience with Kubernetes
• Experience with GoLang

Job Description - REACT Developer- REMOTE

TITLE: REACT Developer

Location: REMOTE

An ICS client is seeking a Senior REACT Developer to join their company full time. You will be developing a suite of SAAS applications to be commercialized.

ESSENTIAL JOB DUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Designs, develops, tests and delivers software solutions using one or more commercial languages as well as, open source tools. Develops and delivers software in an Agile/Scrum environment.
• Manages projects while accepting responsibility over a specialized area. Provides good clear communications to stakeholders, setting expectations. Relies on own judgment, with feedback from Manager.
• Engages with key stakeholders to ensure requirements, schedules and all expectations are understood by the development team and stakeholders for assigned software solutions and software maintenance.
• Develops and executes automated unit testing for all assigned software solutions.
• Supports infrastructure and network teams in analysis and resolution of issues that are software solution related.
• Performs all functions necessary to take software solutions from planning to implementation. Escalates appropriately, if deadlines are in danger of being missed.
• Coordinates with management to ensure identification of appropriate schedules, goals, design criteria, methodology, etc.
• Shares knowledge, lessons learned and best practices among the team.
• Supports and guides the delivery of software solutions. Provides appropriate documentation.
• Follows all defined software solution methods, processes, and procedures.
• Performs other duties as assigned and modified at manager's discretion.

EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE CRITERIA:
• Experience in JavaScript, React, Python & SQL required
• Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Computer Information Systems, Software Engineering, Software Development, Mathematics or a related field OR additional experience above the minimum will be considered in lieu of the required education on a year-for-year basis required

EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE CRITERIA:
• Experience in JavaScript, React, Python & SQL required
• Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Computer Information Systems, Software Engineering, Software Development, Mathematics or a related field OR additional experience above the minimum will be considered in lieu of the required education on a year-for-year basis required

About Infinity Consulting Solutions

At Infinity Consulting Solutions our mission is to cultivate successful long term relationships with candidates and clients matching the right candidate with the right client. We believe technology cannot replace the real personal relationships we cultivate. We reject the notion that technology alone is the answer to staffing which is why we our successful partnerships rely on collaboration NOT automation. ICS has been providing flexible staffing solutions for over 20 years in Information Technology, Compliance, Accounting / Finance and Corporate Support. Our staffing solutions include Contract, Temp to Perm and Permanent Placement.

ICS is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

job_description:
Sogeti is a leading provider of professional technology services, specializing in Application Management, Infrastructure Management and High-Tech Engineering. Sogeti offers cutting-edge solutions around Testing, Business Intelligence, Mobility, Cloud and Security, combining world class methodologies and the global delivery model, Rightshore®. Sogeti brings together more than 20,000 professionals in 15 countries and is present in over 100 locations in Europe, the US and India. Sogeti is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Cap Gemini S.A., listed on the Paris Stock Exchange.

At Sogeti USA, we are committed to building a long and enduring relationship with our employees and to creating an environment that rewards and empowers. Our mission is to constantly exceed our employees' expectations in the same way that we strive to exceed our clients' expectations. We offer an environment that celebrates innovation and helps you to achieve a good balance between your professional and personal life. We strive to be an employer of choice!

Minimum education qualification
• Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, MIS or related field.

• Strongunderstanding and hands on experience with various flavors of JavaScript

• Medical/Prescription/Dental/Vision Coverage!
• Low-premium and deductible. Plan with free preventive care.
• $12,000 in Tuition Reimbursement
• 100% Company-paid mobile phone plan
• Personal Time Off (PTO)- Ensuring a balance of work and home life

Sogeti is an Equal Opportunity Employer encouraging diversity in the workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, gender identity/expression, age, religion, disability, sexual orientation, genetics, veteran status, marital status or any other characteristic protected by law.

job_description:
Remote working is the new norm. It’s not just for pandemics. Do you want to avoid a daily commute, reduce stress, achieve work-life balance, spend more time with your family/friends, be more creative and improve your productivity? At RemoteStar, we follow a remote-first work policy. If you’re passionate about working from wherever you want, helping leading start-ups and scale-ups, RemoteStar can be a great fit. At RemoteStar we help both employers and employees to build a great remote-team culture, reduce overheads and improve productivity while doing very cool work.

About Role - Remote Senior Frontend React Developer/ Architect:

A UK-based company is looking for a dynamic, creative, Senior FullStack Developer to develop and scale their SAAS product .

This is a fully remote role and requires fluency in written and verbal English.

As Senior FrontEnd Developer, You will be working on the UX and technical creation and maintenance of the product. Some of these are both internal and external web applications, others are heavily integrated as features on client websites for consumption by the general public.

This is a full-time permanent role for a true self-starter, someone who wants to build something from the beginning.

As our Remote Senior Frontend React Developer/ Architect you will:
• Help shape product by leading the overall design and development of the technical solution, owning the technical strategy and how it evolves
• Be responsible for building full stack features from scratch
• Be doing lot of problem solving critical production issues in a timely manner
• Designing and developing user interfaces using best practices,
• Shine with engineering excellence by developing test infrastructures, writing documentation, ensuring high performance, and following an agile development methodology
• Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web- capable devices and browsers
• Research on new frameworks for improving the architecture
• Ensure development best practices are followed (Clean Code, Clean Architecture, code reviews)
• Actively communicate with the stakeholders, team members, and clients

What do we value
• In-depth knowledge of React framework
• Expereince at CSS and enjoy developing design systems
• Experience with either Rails framework (or similar like Django)
• Nice to have experience with technologies (Mobx,webpack,PostgreSQL,Pusher)
• Nice to have experience with UX/UI design and prototyping
• Nice to have experience in working on real-time sync in collaborative applications.
• Nice to have experience in scaling web applications and optimizing frontend code.
• Experience with workflow tools (Github Actions, Sentry, Mixpanel, Jira).
• Nice to have experience with deploying production grade systems on Amazon Web Services (EC2, CloudFront, S3).
• Contribution to open source projects.
• Nice to have experience with maintaining WordPress.
• A results-focused mindset.
• Ability to work in a diverse, multi-cultural, remote-team environment.
• Great English communication skills as well as collaboration skills and a strong teamwork. mentality. You must be fluent in English.
• Able to proactively communicate with non-technical stakeholders, manage expectations, and explain the value of addressing technical debt.

What do we offer?
• Participate in an open, fun, entrepreneurial and creative company culture and work with unique and innovative clients.
• Be part of a global, distributed organisation with international opportunities.
• Work from the location of your choice with remote and flexible working — we trust you to work whenever and wherever you feel most productive.
• Competitive compensation.
• Project and feature ownership — you get to contribute and own parts of apps and/or products.
• Unlimited annual leave; we do our best work when we’re feeling refreshed so take the time you need to relax!
• Found a great book, meetup or conference? We support your continued learning!
• It’s important to stay healthy, so we have a wellness benefit towards your total health.
• BYOD – You are welcome to work from your own choice of laptop and we will contribute towards that.

Please send your CV and expression of interest to: hr@remotestar.io

Who are we?

We are RemoteStar, a team of experienced engineering and people leaders on a mission to transform how we work.

We’re not your typical workplace. At RemoteStar, we believe in data-driven decision making and the importance of flexibility, fun, passion, personal growth, and transparency. And we’re doing everything we can to make sure you’re enjoying every minute you spend with us.

Here at RemoteStar, we’re passionate about creating an inclusive culture that encourages, supports, and celebrates the diverse voices of our employees. Everyone is welcome. We don’t discriminate on the basis of any protected characteristic including race, religion or belief, gender or gender reassignment, age, sexual orientation, marital status, or disability. We want to facilitate everyone in bringing their best selves to our interviews, so if there are any adjustments we can make for our process to be more inclusive, please let us know.

Additionally, trust and privacy are important to us here at RemoteStar, so we would like to let you know that upon submitting an application, your CV and personal details will be added to our database and may be used to match you to any future, suitable vacancies as they arise. Of course, we will remove your details at any time should you wish us to do so.

Qualifications: Expereince at CSS and enjoy developing design systems
Experience with either Rails framework (or similar like Django)
Nice to have experience with technologies (Mobx,webpack,PostgreSQL,Pusher)
Nice to have experience with UX/UI design and prototyping
Nice to have experience in working on real-time sync in collaborative applications
Nice to have experience in scaling web applications and optimizing frontend code
Experience with workflow tools (Github Actions, Sentry, Mixpanel, Jira)
Nice to have experience with deploying production grade systems on Amazon Web Services (EC2, CloudFront, S3)
A results-focused mindset
Ability to work in a diverse, multi-cultural, remote-team environment
Great English communication skills as well as collaboration skills and a strong teamwork
You must be fluent in English
Able to proactively communicate with non-technical stakeholders, manage expectations, and explain the value of addressing technical debt
Responsibilities: As Senior FrontEnd Developer, You will be working on the UX and technical creation and maintenance of the product
Some of these are both internal and external web applications, others are heavily integrated as features on client websites for consumption by the general public
Help shape product by leading the overall design and development of the technical solution, owning the technical strategy and how it evolves
Be responsible for building full stack features from scratch
Be doing lot of problem solving critical production issues in a timely manner
Designing and developing user interfaces using best practices,
Shine with engineering excellence by developing test infrastructures, writing documentation, ensuring high performance, and following an agile development methodology
Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web- capable devices and browsers
Research on new frameworks for improving the architecture
Ensure development best practices are followed (Clean Code, Clean Architecture, code reviews)
Actively communicate with the stakeholders, team members, and clients
Benefits: Participate in an open, fun, entrepreneurial and creative company culture and work with unique and innovative clients
Be part of a global, distributed organisation with international opportunities
Work from the location of your choice with remote and flexible working — we trust you to work whenever and wherever you feel most productive
Project and feature ownership — you get to contribute and own parts of apps and/or products
Unlimited annual leave; we do our best work when we’re feeling refreshed so take the time you need to relax!
It’s important to stay healthy, so we have a wellness benefit towards your total health
BYOD – You are welcome to work from your own choice of laptop and we will contribute towards that

job_description:
Our direct client, a fast-growing digital healthcare company based in NY, is looking for a front-end developer with React experience. Client’s mission is to help advance the discovery of new medications and treatments, working with patients, pharmaceutical and biotech companies. This position can be 100% remote. You will write lots of typescript, build UIs, submit pull requests, participate in code reviews, and help to build top notch healthcare products. You are also expected to be proficient with CSS.

Responsibilities:
• Design and develop React frontend components
• Integrate REST api backend endpoints
• Develop frontend dashboards and forms
• Write css/sass for styling visual elements
• Help us fix bugs and advise on best practices
• Write secure testable code including unit tests
• Integrate code with CI/CD pipelines
• Work with team leads on requirements and communicate level-of-effort and timelines
• Submit and review pull requests

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in CS or equivalent experience
• 6+ years of JavaScript frontend development experience (including css)
• 6+ years of CSS experience
• 4+ years of React experience
• 4+ years of Typescript experience
• Experience with Git, pull requests, and code reviews (you should understand Git rebase)
• Experience with agile software development and Kanban
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills

Tools and IDEs:
• Use the OS, IDE, and code editor of your choice. We have team members using WebStorm, vscode, and vim, working on macOS, Linux, and windows. You are expected to be proficient with git, we use GitHub for managing code.

Nice To Have Skills
• Experience with Kubernetes
• Experience with GoLang
- provided by Dice

Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in CS or equivalent experience
6+ years of JavaScript frontend development experience (including css)
4+ years of React experience
4+ years of Typescript experience
Experience with Git, pull requests, and code reviews (you should understand Git rebase)
Experience with agile software development and Kanban
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
We have team members using WebStorm, vscode, and vim, working on macOS, Linux, and windows
You are expected to be proficient with git, we use GitHub for managing code

job_description:
About the React/Front-end Developer position

We are looking for an experienced React/JavaScript Developer with a passion for working with and applying new technologies and staying up to speed on the latest and greatest of the fast changing world of front-end development.

The ideal candidate will be someone who prioritizes being part of a team and has a desire to work on medium to long term projects at scale, but embraces the satisfaction of shipping and the challenge of taking on new projects often. A willingness to productively share ideas and knowledge, and work in a mentorship driven culture where they are either in a mentorship role or being mentored is a recipe for success.

Exceptional candidates will have knowledge and/or experience in writing tests for the code they ship and/or some rudimentary understanding of application security as it relates to browser related subjects. If you can jump into the back-end and build out API's and get your hands dirty in the whole stack we love you even more.

An eye for clean and practical user interfaces and experiences is also a bonus.

What makes us stand out?

Sudokrew was founded on a simple but core principle: Build stuff that matters.

We are a blended shop of team augmentation working with top-tier tech companies, but also take the lead on developing greenfield projects in areas like clean energy, as well as build our own products/technologies in the IoT space.

We invest in people regardless of where they are in their career. We believe that building people up is a recipe for success and that an investment in people is an investment in ourselves.

If you don't have all of the criteria listed on this position but you believe that you have the will to succeed, apply anyways. We'd be happy to talk to you and for the right candidates, we are willing to provide a training path prior to employment to fill in the gaps for the specific requirements that we need for you to be successful in what we do.

Front-end Developer responsibilities are:
• Developing component based user interfaces for data-driven applications using modern tooling and best practices
• Optimize applications for maximum speed and design mobile-based features
• Develop quality mockups and prototypes
• Work together with back-end developers and web designers to implement component and product designs
• Write functional requirement documents and guides
• Assist back-end developers with coding and troubleshooting
• Keep in touch with latest trends in web development

Front-end Developer requirements are:
• 2-3 "years" experience of working with React or at least a deep understanding and the ability to build well-designed components
• Significant experience with vanilla JavaScript and CSS
• Excellent understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)
• Knowledge of browser testing and debugging
• Knowledge of browser based application security attacks and mitigation (optional)
• Excellent analytical and multitasking skills with an ability to perform well in a dynamic environment
• Enough of an education to know what you're doing (however you learned to do what you do)

Additional Notes:

Candidates must be based in the US and have US permanent residency or citizenship. We are not able to sponsor visas (such as H1-B) at this time.
